key_risks: Intense market competition from retail giants and discount chains
Susceptibility to changes in labor laws, environmental regulations, and trade policies
Operational and financial challenges in achieving sustainability goals
environmental_issues: Challenges in transitioning to renewable energy and sustainable sourcing
social_issues: Dependence on regional economic fluctuations and consumer spending trends

sources.title: Welcome | Colruyt Group
sources.snippet: Colruyt Group is a Belgian family business which, over three generations, has grown into a retail group with more than 33,000 workers, active in three countries. And the group still has the strengths of a family business, such as passion, expertise, simplicity and efficiency. Our aim is sustainable growth, with respect for health, society, animal welfare and the environment.
